subject: FW: [junit] Re: how to compare two object
msgSnippet: I am using EqualsBuilder from Apache (org.apache.commons.lang.builder.EqualsBuilder) which uses Reflection to compares two object.
messageBody:
I am using EqualsBuilder from Apache
(org.apache.commons.lang.builder.EqualsBuilder) which uses Reflection to
compares two object.
http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/lang/api/index.html
Assert.assertTrue(EqualsBuilder.reflectionEquals(obj1, obj2));

Hope it helps.

Veny
